uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.io
Interface WorkflowBundleReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
StructureReader
public interface WorkflowBundleReader

A reader for WorkflowBundles. Implementations specify workflow bundle formats (media types/mime types) that they can read.

Method Summary
 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMediaTypes()
          Return the media types that this reader can read.
 java.lang.String guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[] firstBytes)
          Attempt to guess the media type for a stream or file that starts with these bytes.

          Read a file containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and return a WorkflowBundle.
 WorkflowBundle readBundle(java.io.InputStream inputStream, java.lang.String mediaType)
          Read a stream containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and return a WorkflowBundle.
 

Method Detail

getMediaTypes

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMediaTypes()
Return the media types that this reader can read.

Returned media types are must be valid mediaType arguments to readBundle(File, String) and/or readBundle(InputStream, String) for this reader.

It is recommended, but not required, that the reader can also recognise those media types from guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[]).

If the returned set is empty, the reader should should be able to Recognise at least one media type from guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[]).

Returns:
the media types that this reader can read, or an empty set if this reader can't read any bundle formats.

readBundle

WorkflowBundle readBundle(java.io.File bundleFile,
                          java.lang.String mediaType)
                          throws ReaderException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Read a file containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and return a WorkflowBundle.

Parameters:
bundleFile - the file containing the workflow bundle
mediaType - the media type of the workflow bundle
Returns:
the WorkflowBundle read from the file
Throws:
ReaderException - if there is an error parsing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the file

readBundle

WorkflowBundle readBundle(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                          java.lang.String mediaType)
                          throws ReaderException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Read a stream containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and return a WorkflowBundle.

Parameters:
inputStream - the stream containing the workflow bundle
mediaType - the media type of the workflow bundle
Returns:
the WorkflowBundle read from the stream
Throws:
ReaderException - if there is an error parsing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from the stream

guessMediaTypeForSignature

java.lang.String guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[] firstBytes)
Attempt to guess the media type for a stream or file that starts with these bytes.

Return null if ambiguous (more than one possibility) or unknown.

Typically a WorkflowBundleReader should be able to recognise the same types as those listed in getMediaTypes(), but this is no requirement. A WorkflowBundleReader could also recognise types not listed in its getMediaTypes().

Parameters:
firstBytes - The initial bytes, at least 512 bytes long unless the resource is smaller.
Returns:
The recognised media type, or null if the bytes were ambiguous or unknown.
